title: AST SpaceMobile raises $400 million to accelerate direct-to-smartphone plans
summary:
AST SpaceMobile has raised $400 million through convertible debt to help ramp up manufacturing for its direct-to-smartphone constellation.

title: NASA Tests Air Traffic Surveillance Technology Using Its Pilatus PC-12 Aircraft
summary: As air taxis, drones, and other innovative aircraft enter U.S. airspace, systems that communicate an aircraft’s location will be critical to ensure air traffic safety. The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) requires aircraft to communicate their locations to other aircraft and air traffic control in real time using an Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) system. title: NASA Invests in Artemis Studies to Support Long-Term Lunar Exploration
summary: NASA awarded new study contracts Thursday to help support life and work on the lunar surface.
